news.title: Privacy at a cost: the dark web’s main browser helps pedophile networks flourish, experts say
news.summary: The Tor network’s privacy architecture creates a safe haven for predators to share child sexual abuse material. Millions of child predators are forming sprawling online communities on the dark web using the Tor network, where criminal behavior escalates. Despite repeated warnings of a growing number of predators taking advantage of it, Tor's developers have taken no action to curb this content.
